name: Unreliable (Flamaniax)
description:
You are walking down the street, when suddenly you are teleported into a brick room with your demons as company. You have nothing on you, except your EXPERT MARTIAL ARTS SKILLS! Which have been made severely unreliable due to your heavy drinking. Pray to god that you're lucky with your strikes.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys to Move.

U to attack.

P to retry the game.

Esc to quit the game.

Notes: this is pretty unfinished, So I might come back to this concept one day.
